messages.content: You are a helpful German language assistant.

This is an atomic edit extraction task. Given a pair of German sentences and a list of edits, your task is to extract atomic edits and assign each edit a label. Be case sensitive. Pay attention to punctuation marks and relocated tokens (relocated tokens should not be changed before and after being relocated). Pay attention to phonetic similarity when aligning tokens.
Sentence pair:
Ich wünsche ein neues Auto und ein großes Haus kaufen, und schöne Urlaub nach Paris fahren.
Ich wünsche mir, ein neues Auto und ein großes Haus zu kaufen und für einen schönen Urlaub nach Paris zu fahren.
list of edits:
('insert', '', 'mir ,')
('insert', '', 'zu')
('delete', ',', '')
('replace', 'schöne', 'für einen schönen')
('insert', '', 'zu')

["insert", "", "mir"]
["insert", "", ","]
["insert", "", "zu"]
["delete", ",", ""]
["insert", "", "für"]
["insert", "", "einen"]
["replace", "schöne", "schönen"]
["insert", "", "zu"]
You are a helpful German language assistant.
